## Course Information

::: {.panel-tabset}

## Schedule

| Week | Topics | Deliverables |
|------|--------|--------------|
| 1-2 | Introduction, Setup, Fundamentals | Quiz 1 |
| 3-4 | Core Concepts, Practical Applications | Assignment 1 |
| 5-6 | Intermediate Topics, Case Studies | Project Proposal |
| 7-8 | Advanced Techniques, Optimization | Assignment 2 |
| 9-10 | Final Project, Presentations | Final Project |

## Grading

| Component | Weight | Description |
|-----------|--------|-------------|
| Participation | 10% | Engagement in discussions and activities |
| Quizzes | 20% | Short assessments throughout the course |
| Assignments | 30% | Hands-on exercises and projects |
| Final Project | 40% | Comprehensive capstone project |

**Grading Scale**:
- A: 90-100%
- B: 80-89%
- C: 70-79%
- D: 60-69%
- F: Below 60%

## Learning Outcomes

By the end of this course, you will be able to:

::: {.learning-objectives}

- **Understand**: Core principles and fundamental concepts
- **Apply**: Theoretical knowledge to practical problems
- **Analyze**: Complex scenarios using learned techniques
- **Evaluate**: Different approaches and methodologies
- **Create**: Original solutions and projects
- **Collaborate**: Effectively with peers on shared goals

## Frequently Asked Questions

::: {.accordion}

::: {.accordion-item}
::: {.accordion-header}
How long does the course take to complete?
:::
::: {.accordion-body}

The course is designed to be completed in 10 weeks with 5-7 hours of study per week. However, you can progress at your own pace.

:::
:::

::: {.accordion-item}
::: {.accordion-header}
What if I fall behind?
:::
::: {.accordion-body}

Life happens! Reach out to the instructor as soon as possible. We can work together to create a catch-up plan.

:::
:::

::: {.accordion-item}
::: {.accordion-header}
Is there a certificate upon completion?
:::
::: {.accordion-body}

Yes! Students who successfully complete all requirements will receive a certificate of completion.

:::
:::

::: {.accordion-item}
::: {.accordion-header}
Can I access materials after the course ends?
:::
::: {.accordion-body}

Absolutely! All course materials remain accessible indefinitely, and you can review them anytime.

:::
:::

:::
